alert.note: Alert for Calvert (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 9:41PM EST until December 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Calvert County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EST Monday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low-lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Solomons Island is at 6:00 AM and 6:37 PM. The next high tide at Chesapeake Beach is at 7:57 AM and 8:30 PM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/08 AM 2.8 1.4 2.1 1.0 None 18/09 PM 2.1 0.7 1.0 0.5 None 19/08 AM 1.1 -0.3 0.4 0.5 None 19/09 PM 0.6 -0.8 -0.4 0.5 None 20/10 AM 0.3 -1.1 -0.6 0.5 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/05 AM 3.2 1.7 2.3 2.0 Minor 18/05 PM 2.3 0.8 1.4 1.0 None 19/06 AM 1.2 -0.3 0.3 1.0 None 19/07 PM 0.7 -0.8 -0.3 1.0 None 20/07 AM 0.6 -0.9 -0.4 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
